Description: Trees without any evidence of breakage were collected from closed stands.
Leaf areas were measured for 108 leaves taken from 11 sample trees of 37 cm to 1870 cm in height.
Measured by a caliper in two directions
Fresh weights were measured and some samples were oven dried and weighed. And the fresh weights were later converted to oven dry weights.
A species with moderately shade tolerance.
A species with moderately shade tolerance.
